cmi.tooltip.steam_hammer.summary: Pressing _stacks_ of items while working (Invalid for _Automated Packing_)
cmi.tooltip.steam_hammer.behaviour1: Only functions when _%s mB_ of steam is in the device
cmi.tooltip.steam_hammer.behaviour2: Consumes _%s mB_ of steam per operation
cmi.tooltip.accelerator_motor.behaviour1: A rotational generator that provides _no stress_
cmi.tooltip.accelerator_motor.behaviour2: Its default maximum rotational speed is _%s RPM_
cmi.tooltip.void_dust_collector.summary: Can collect void dust while working on vanity spring
cmi.tooltip.void_dust_collector.workTime: Collect one void dust per _%s Tick_
jei.catalyst.cmi.accelerator.1: Use a mechanism on the accelerator
jei.catalyst.cmi.accelerator.2: Requires at least 24 triggerable blocks in a 5×5 area around
